title: paramEshanai parvathi
sahitya:
paramEshanai pArvati pAghanai pArkka pArkka pArkkap-paramAnandamE



anupallavi



vara nAthanai giri rAjanai vagIshAdi munivar vAzttum pAdanaip



caraNam



siddha shAntiyuDan bhakti sheiyum toNDar cintanaikkamudAi vandu

vandu inikkum

shuddha mukta sukhAnanda vAriyai shurar pOTruginra karuNA nidhiyaip
